name: CustomComponent
description: Flexible component wrapper that dynamically loads custom components from the custom component registry with support for client, server, and hybrid component types

componentName.description: Name of the custom component to load from the registry

props.description: Props to pass to the loaded component

serverData.description: Server-side data to merge with props

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the wrapper

importPath.description: Optional import path for dynamic component loading

examples.name: Basic Custom Component
examples.description: Load a custom component from the registry
